name: ReDo (Time Travel 2D Platformer Prototype)
description:
ReDo is a platform video game prototype created as part of my studies at Abertay University. It features traditional aspects of the ‘Platformer’ genre while also integrating various time-manipulation abilities. The player progresses through the prototype by using these said abilities. The prototype can be “completed” by collecting 18, collectible Coins.

I'm putting out this prototype in the hope that it gets feedbacks and love, so I might go with it into development; let me know if that something I should do with it!

Follow me on Twitter for more project updates:
https://twitter.com/balazsblesko 

The following content were used: 

Free Platform Game Assets
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/free-platform-game-assets-... 

Controller Prompts
https://thoseawesomeguys.com/prompts/ 

200 Free SFX
https://kronbits.itch.io/freesf
